articles.author: Jorge Castillo
articles.title: 1st-time All-Star Duran shines in MVP effort for AL - ESPN
articles.description: Boston's Jarren Duran, the All-Star MVP, hit a tiebreaking two-run homer in the fifth inning and the American League beat the National League 5-3 on Tuesday night for its 10th win in the past 11 All-Star Games.
articles.content: ARLINGTON, Texas -- On a night when Paul Skenes, Major League Baseball's pitching phenom, toed the rubber for a historic All-Star Game start, and Shohei Ohtani, the sport's brightest global superstar… [+7375 chars]

articles.author: Jack Harris
articles.title: Shohei Ohtani's three-run blast caps memorable All-Star week for Dodgers - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: A night after Teoscar Hernández won the Home Run Derby, Shohei Ohtani hits a three-run home run before the American League prevails in the MLB All-Star Game.
articles.content:
Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani hits a three-run home run during the third inning at the MLB All-Star Game on Tuesday. (LM Otero / Associated Press)
Shohei Ohtani wasn't able to participate in this weeks… [+6944 chars]
